text: iman kontu (salihana) nalla amalkal ceytuvarum tan atiyarkalukku allah nanmarayan kuruvatum ituve (napiye!) Nir kurum; "uravinarkal mitu anpu kolvatait tavira, itarkaka nan unkalitam yatoru kuliyum ketkavillai!" Anriyum, evar oru nanmai ceykiraro, avarukku nam atil pinnum (pala) nanmaiyai atikamakkuvom; niccayamaka allah mannippavanakavum, nanriyai erruk kolpavanakavum irukkinran
